text: How much money do you spend daily on extras like a coffee or treat?
I spend about 5 dollars a day, you?
About 1 dollar per day. Do you think that amount of money would make a difference in a needy child's life?
I think it would in many places
I agree. Are you familiar with a charity called Save the Children?
No i am not can you explain?
Save the Children is an international non-governmental organization that promotes children's rights, provides relief and helps support children in developing countries.
Wow thats great. How can I help?
We can help by making a donation which is essential to help ensuring children's rights to health, education, safety, etc.
Thank you. How do i donate?
You can donate by choosing an amount of your task payment from $0 to all.
Ok i will donate some
That's great! The monies will go to a worthy cause.  Every little bit helps.
Tha k you so much for the infkrmation
You are welcome.
I will donate 10 cents
Any chance you would consider making a greater donation?
That is all i can afford
It is automatically deducted from your task payment.  It will be collected by the research team and sent to Save the Children.  Thank you for your contribution!
Tha k you for my awareness
